description: A stent placed in the trachea to maintain airway patency.

attributes.name: Presence of Tracheal Stent
attributes.description: Indicates whether a tracheal stent is present or absent.

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Indicates the status of the tracheal stent.

values.name: New placement
values.description: The tracheal stent has been newly placed.

values.name: Complication
values.description: The tracheal stent has developed a complication.

values.name: Removed
values.description: The tracheal stent has been removed.

attributes.name: Location
attributes.description: Indicates the location of the tracheal stent.

values.name: Proximal trachea
values.description: The tracheal stent is located in the proximal trachea.

values.name: Mid trachea
values.description: The tracheal stent is located in the mid trachea.

values.name: Distal trachea
values.description: The tracheal stent is located in the distal trachea.

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: Indicates the type of the tracheal stent.

values.name: Fully covered
values.description: The tracheal stent is fully covered.

values.name: Partially covered
values.description: The tracheal stent is partially covered.

attributes.name: Stent Length
attributes.description: Indicates the length of the tracheal stent.

attributes.name: Stent Diameter
attributes.description: Indicates the diameter of the tracheal stent.

attributes.name: Complication
attributes.description: Indicates any complication associated with the tracheal stent.

values.name: None
values.description: No complication associated with the tracheal stent.

values.name: Mucosal erosion
values.description: Mucosal erosion associated with the tracheal stent.

values.name: Perforation
values.description: Perforation associated with the tracheal stent.
